verses.1: Amaute in, “Hong pai un, Topa kiangah ciahkik ni; amah in eite hong bal gawp hangin hong damsakkik dinga, eite hong liamsak hangin i liammate hong tunsakkik ding hi lo ahi hiam?
verses.2: Ni nih sungin eite hong thahatsak dinga, ni thum sungin i ngei hong bangsak ding hi. Tua ciangin amah tawh i kikhawl ding hi.
verses.3: Topa i theih zawh nadingin hanciam ni. Zingsang sialin pel loin khua a vak mah bangin pel loin eite kiangah amah hong pai dinga, lei a kawtsak khuapi guah pel loin hong zuk bangin eite kiangah amah hong pai hamtang ding hi,” a ci ding uh hi.
verses.4: Israel le Judah aw, note bang hong cih thei nawn ding ka hi hiam? Noteʼ hong itna pen zingsang meii lum bangin theng pak a, a mangthang pak daitui tawh kibang lel hi.
verses.5: Tua ahih manin note a hong thuhilh ding le note a hong taii dingin ka kamsangte kong sawl hi. No ka miteʼ gamtat ding ka deih zia kitel sinsen hi.
verses.6: Keima deih pen nong it tawntung ding uh hizaw a, gan tawh nong biakna uh ka deih pen hi lo zaw hi. Gan tawh nong biakna uh sangin kei nong theih ding uh ka deih zaw hi.
verses.7: Ahi zongin ka ciamna gam a tun uh ciangin amaute in Adam khua ah ka thuciamna palsat uh a, kei tungah hong thuman lo uh hi.
verses.8: Gilead pen migilo hontangteʼ omna khuapi hi a, mi thahna sisan luang tawh amauʼ sul a kidim hi.
verses.9: Zawhthawh thu-in miʼ na a sut dingin a pangsim mite bangin siampite gamta uh a, biakna a pia dingin Shekhem khua ah a pai mite nangawn, lamkal ah a that uh hi. Amau gamtatna siahuai mahmah hi.
verses.10: Israel mite lakah siatna lianpi khat ka mu hi. Milim biakna tawh amaute kininsak uh hi.
verses.11: No Judah mite zong gim kong piak ding hun kiseh khinzo hi. Ka mihingte a ngei uh bangsakkik ning,
